reviewText: I was very disappointed.all the world had one good vignette the overall quality and acting was subpar to what you would expect in a horror anthology movie...I would recommend purchasing one of the old Hammer films horror anthology movies should you want to check out this genre.

This is a pretty good low-budget horror anthology.  I got it because I am a Jeff Strand fan and wanted to see his story made into film.  Give it a shot, I liked it more than a lot of movies with a similar theme.
A great mix of classic horror stories. I especially enjoyed the 4th story by Lyddon/Lansdale. Highly recommend it.
